title: [Health] Adding fluoride to water supplies may deliver a modest benefit to children’s dental health, finds an NIHR-funded study. But, the benefits are smaller than shown in previous studies - carried out 50 years ago - when fluoride toothpaste was less available in the UK.
[Cancer] Discovery of DRP-104, a tumor-targeted metabolic inhibitor prodrug — DRP-104 affected multiple metabolic pathways in tumor, including decreased glutamine flux into the TCA cycle
